subject: [R] Problem with saving R plot in Emacs
body:
Hi, 
    I am having problem with saving figures when I use R in Emacs (ESS).  Whenever I try to save a plot, the Emacs freezes
and I have to close it. 
    I am using Win XP  , R binaries,  Emacs for windows.
    Somebody got the same problem ? Can I get some suggestions ?

thanks a lot

tong
